title: Astura
description: Astura was once a coastal island of Latium and is now a small peninsula at the southeastern edge of the Bay of Antium.

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 7688

properties.description: A Medieval coastal fort of the  Frangipani.. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: location of Torre Astura
